channel.title: Ok im getting pissed off!
channel.description: IM GETTING SO FREKAING PISSED BECAUSE ERRORS KEEP COMMING INTO OUR SERVER Progjex-scape.no-ip.org AND KILLING NPC'S AND CRASHING OUR SERVER EVERY #) SECS I DEMAND SOMETHING BE DONE ABOUT THIS BECAUSE WE CANT IP BAN THEM CUZ MOPARSCAPE TOOK THAT OFF IN Moparscape v2 SO DO SOMETHING BEFOR I FREAKING KILL SOMEBODY!!!!

item.title: Ok im getting pissed off!

item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

Ok, i think you mean people, anyways just get the persons name in your server go to your char folder and get the ip and put it in the Ipban list, there are easier methods, but i highly doubt you have them, because if you did, you wouldn’t be posting here. =/
